document_data.name: Pipeweed
document_data.mainbody: '''Pipeweed''' was a plant, usually smoked in pipes, that produced a feeling of calmness. In [[Airspur]], pipeweed was called '''tabac''' and was often flavored and smoked in water pipes.{{Cite digital book/Spinner of Lies|3723}}
document_data.Availability: ''Circa'' [[1364 DR]], a rich farm that grew pipeweed could be found to the south of [[Mosstone]], [[Tethyr]]. The farm was said to offer a good price for [[wild elf]] slaves.
